definition.title: SA Dynamics
definition.content: \(\dot x_i = \proj_{x_i}\left( \frac{\sum_j e^{\beta \langle x_i, x_j \rangle} x_j}{\sum_k e^{\beta \langle x_i, x_k \rangle}} \right)\), \(x_i \in \mathbb{S}^{d-1}\)

definition.title: USA Dynamics
definition.impact: Unnormalized variant revealing fundamental contraction mechanisms

definition.title: Equiangular Model
definition.content: Configuration where \(\rho(t) := \langle x_i(t), x_j(t) \rangle\) is equal for all \(i \neq j\)
definition.impact: Reduces dynamics to analyzable ODEs for pairwise alignment

definition.title: Interaction Energy
definition.impact: Drives gradient flow structure under Wasserstein metric

theorem.title: Global Clustering
theorem.content: For \(d \geq 3\), \(n \geq 2\), \(\beta \geq 0\), solutions to SA/USA dynamics converge to a single cluster for almost all initial conditions: \(\lim_{t \to \infty} \|x_i(t) - x_j(t)\| = 0\) \(\forall i,j\)
theorem.impact: Quantifies representation collapse in deep Transformers

theorem.title: Exponential Local Rates
theorem.content: If tokens lie in a common open hemisphere initially, \(\|x_i(t) - x^*\| \leq C e^{-\lambda t}\) for SA/USA
theorem.impact: First explicit convergence rates under hemisphere conditions

theorem.title: Mean-Field Rates
theorem.content: For \(\mu_t\) solving the continuity equation with \(|\beta| < \beta_0\) and \(R_0 > 0\), \(W_2(\mu_t, \delta_{x_\infty}) \leq C_0 e^{-t/100}\)
theorem.impact: Connects finite-particle dynamics to mean-field limit

dissatisfaction.title: Dimension d=2 Failure
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Proofs for \(d \geq 3\) rely on topological properties absent in \(d=2\)

dissatisfaction.title: Large β Metastability
dissatisfaction.desired_behavior: Global convergence should persist for all \(\beta\)
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Energy landscape develops multiple saddles at high \(\beta\)

dissatisfaction.title: d=2 Topological Obstruction
dissatisfaction.heuristic: Kuramoto model techniques don't generalize for \(\beta > 0\)

example.title: Equiangular Model Dynamics
example.actual_behavior: Exponential convergence \(1 - \rho(t) \sim e^{-\lambda_\beta t}\) with \(\lambda_\beta = 2\) (SA) or \(\lambda_\beta = 2e^\beta\) (USA)
example.lesson: Isolates clustering mechanics and normalization effects

example.title: Long-Context Phase Transition
example.lesson: Logarithmic scaling is critical for stable long-context attention

raised_conjecture.title: Noisy Transformers
raised_conjecture.content: Characterize stationary solutions for McKean–Vlasov SDE \(\partial_t \mu_t + \kappa^{-1} \Delta \mu_t = \nabla \cdot (\mu_t \int e^{\beta \langle \cdot, y \rangle} y d\mu_t)\)
raised_conjecture.heuristic: Noise may induce phase transitions in attention dynamics
raised_conjecture.impact: Key for understanding real-world noisy optimization landscapes

raised_conjecture.title: Multi-Cluster Metastability
raised_conjecture.content: Quantify lifetimes of metastable states and transition rates between saddles
raised_conjecture.impact: Explains temporary feature learning before ultimate collapse

raised_conjecture.title: Causal Attention
raised_conjecture.content: Extend clustering results to decoder-only architectures with masking
raised_conjecture.heuristic: Autoregressive constraints may alter convergence properties
